dmca.title: "Discover Stars on Ice presented by Smuckers" Tour
dmca.body:
Dear [Private]:

Thank you for your e-mail requesting permission to use the front cover from each Stars on Ice program since 1992 on your web site.  While we appreciate  your enthusiasm for the tour, we cannot grant you permission to do this

In your e-mail you also mention that you plan to use images you have photographed from past "Stars on Ice" tours on your web site.   You may not be aware that using these images/photographs without the permission of the skaters is an infringement of the skaters' personal rights. On behalf of the skaters who have participated in our tours we must ask you to immediately cease and desist this unauthorized usage.

We trust that you can appreciate the serious nature of this situation and will therefore act accordingly. You may want to consult an attorney to assist you with issues related to your web site.

Sincerely,


[Private]
Senior Corporate Legal Assistant


/31038
